mapper.select: SELECT A.REPROT_CODE , A.REPROTER_EMAIL , A.REPORTED_EMAIL , A.REPROT_REASON , A.REPORT_DATE , A.REPROT_CONTEXT , A.REPROT_APPROVAL FROM REPORT A WHERE A.REPROTER_EMAIL = #{reporterEmail} AND A.REPORTED_EMAIL = #{reportedEmail} AND A.REPROT_REASON = #{reportReason} AND A.REPORT_DATE = SYSDATE
